title: Mass.Effect.1.The.Movie-deathmule
description:
Mass Effect
                           Created by deathmule


Genre -      sci fi
Year- 2012
Size - 5.28 gb
Length    - 06:17:21 (there is 6 parts hour a piece)
Video    - DIVX
Resolution -  720x480/ 29.97 fps/
Audio Language  - English
Audio - mp3/128Kbps
Subs - N/A

Plot:  In a future time, you play an emotionally scarred soldier who must stop a plot to exterminate humanity throughout the galaxy.

Description: i recorded the full Mass Effect video game and made it into a movie. there is no game-play only the story. i made decisions in the game that will give the viewer the most story possible. i watched it today and it came out seamless and the viewer will not be lose at any point in the story. the Mass Effect story is very complex and any sci fi fan will enjoy this. i made this for people who don't like video games but are interested in the Mass Effect story. i hope everyone enjoys it

P.S. i would like to hear any feedback so feel free to post comments after you watch it :) im also working on Mass Effect 2 and 3. ill upload them when i finish it :)
